projects.title: Blockchain Vehicle Lifecycle Tracker
projects.description: AutoCertify is a full-stack decentralized application for tracking vehicle lifecycle events such as ownership transfers, service records, and crash history using smart contracts and NFTs. It includes a Next.js frontend and Hardhat for Ethereum smart contract development.

projects.title: Restaurant Experience Tracker
projects.description: MunchBook is a full-stack restaurant dining tracking and food review application tailored for food-loving groups and families. It enables users to document and analyze their culinary experiences by logging detailed restaurant visits, and leveraging smart analytics and suggestion engines to guide future food adventures.

projects.title: Blockchain-X
projects.description: BlockchainX is an interactive blockchain simulator to visualize mining, create wallets, and send transactions in real-time. Learn blockchain and Bitcoin mining easily.

projects.title: Profile-X
projects.description: Create a stunning GitHub profile in minutes! ProfileX is a web app that helps you generate a customized README.md for your GitHub profile, showcasing your skills, experience, and projects.

projects.title: NFT Lending Dapp Contract
projects.description: NFTLendingContracts is a smart contract backend for an Ethereum-based NFT lending marketplace. It enables lending, borrowing, and liquidation of NFTs with ETH collateral, featuring a fixed 1% daily interest rate.

projects.title: Learning Management System
projects.description: LMS for an offline learning institute, facilitating student enrollment, progress tracking, and instructor interaction.

projects.title: Cafe Management System
projects.description: CMS for local cafe to streamline its online ordering system by integrated QR codes for Tables, Managing Orders, Kitchen Tickets and Customer Management.

projects.title: Insurance Agency Website
projects.description: AP Life Secure - A Business Wesbite for Insurance Company, It was a Freelance Project. Looked after development, deployment and SEO.

projects.title: Developer Portfolio Website
projects.description: A customizable React.js portfolio template. Update data.json to personalize—no coding needed! Perfect for showcasing your work.

about.main: I’m Vandit, a budding full-stack web developer based in Toronto, Canada. Since my first coding adventure in 8th grade, I’ve been hooked on technology.
about.journey: B.C.A. graduate, now exploring Blockchain at York University. I blend design and development to craft innovative solutions.
about.passion: In recent years, I’ve dived into coding, building robust front-end stacks and tackling real-world challenges. I’m passionate about making a difference through technology.
about.connect: Explore my portfolio and let’s connect for collaborations!
